articles.description: In an extensive conversation with Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott, Binance CEO CZ talks global and US regulation, Binance HQ locations, crypto bailouts and how he approaches deals, the sports marketing push by big crypto exchanges and why Binance went slower, and why he believes we live in a simulation.
articles.title: gm: Binance CEO CZ Talks Bailouts, Regulator Demands, and Simulation Theory

articles.title: Chelsea Manning Talks Crypto, Privacy, and Security

articles.description: In an interview for Decrypt's gm podcast, CZ laid out Binance's approach to "bailouts" amid the crypto liquidity crunch, and criticized Alameda's complicated lifeline to Voyager.
articles.title: Binance CEO CZ on Crypto Bailouts and the Deals He Would Not Do

articles.description: Wyoming Sen. Cynthia Lummis, the "Bitcoin Senator," joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on the gm podcast to talk about the Lummis-Gillibrand crypto regulation bill, the need for clearer policy on crypto in DC, and converting crypto skeptics—plus her take on the bear market and NFTs. Make sure to subscribe to the podcast.
articles.title: gm: Senator Cynthia Lummis Is Fighting for Bitcoin

articles.description: Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Kate Irwin, Stacy Elliott and Jason Nelson discuss the news and parse through what’s happened and what might happen next.
articles.title: #DecryptLive  Covering The Continued Crypto Crash

articles.description: Alex Adelman, CEO of Bitcoin shopping rewards app Lolli, talked to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward at NFT NYC about why NFTs have impressed him and why he's "kind of sad" because Bitcoin "should have captured" the cultural moment that Ethereum and NFTs did.
articles.title: Lolli Bitcoin Shopping App CEO at NFT NYC: NFTs 'Captured the Zeitgeist'

articles.description: Just ahead of a live event during NFT NYC from BeetsDAO and Decrypt, Margaret Link and Keatly Haldeman of Dequency talk to Decrypt EIC Dan Roberts about how their company is using the Algorand blockchain to de-bug the decades-old process of music synchronization rights.
articles.title: NFT NYC: How Dequency Is Using Blockchain to Decentralize Music Usage Rights

articles.description: A first look at actor Bill Murray's upcoming Ethereum NFT project with The Chive and Project Venkman.
articles.title: The Bill Murray 1,000 NFT Project Reveal Trailer

articles.description: Stepn is the talk of Crypto Twitter: an app that rewards you in crypto for exercising outdoors. But first you have to buy a pricey sneaker NFT. Stepn CMO Shiti Manghani joined the gm podcast to talk about how the app works, its GST and GMT tokens, Stepn's recent decision regarding China, and why the future for NFTs is utility.
articles.title: gm: Meet 'Move to Earn' NFT App Stepn
